channel.title: Client/service: v2
channel.description:
## refactoring service pkg * Think about improving task handler by changing the return types. _Data_ type needs the conversions for constants. We may need to change it to just an _interface{}_ * Consider using 'mesg' tag name on struct fields because devs shouldn't be aware of json encoding in the higher level. And they may need to use 'json' tag in their own business logic. https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/708
## refactoring servicetest pkg * Think about getting rid of channels inside _LastX()_ funcs. They can block forever. https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/708 * Consider mocking instead of creating a fake service
